annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 16-137 rewrote the section which had read as follows: “This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among states enacting it.”

annoGroup.heading: Effective Dates
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: “This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007.”

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 901 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
